controlbits.name: Software Bop
controlbits.desc: When walking L->R or R->L, the head will 'bop' up and down. Benjamin is drawn this way. Enable to have the animation engine do the 'bopping.'
controlbits.enabled: Animation engine will 'bop' the head frame up and down when walking L->R or R->L.
controlbits.disabled: Animation engine draws exactly what is in the sheet.

controlbits.name: Full Horizontal Flip
controlbits.desc: When walking up and down, only the bottom tiles flip horizontally to animate the sprite. Enable to make the top tiles flip horizontally as well.
controlbits.enabled: Full sprite will flip horizontally when walking up and down.
controlbits.disabled: Only bottom half of sprite will flip horizontally when walking up and down.
